description:
Hibi loses his fight to Yamada and now it`s time for Kuro to step up to the plate. Noguchi encounters Sato and Suzuki while following orders from the Director and he leads them into a secret underground facility formerly run by the Japanese army.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kuro Finally Took Up a Sword
Tsui ni, Kurou ga Katana o Nigitta
ついに, 九郎が刀を握った
